reviewText: really great resource!!  Mike is a great, easy going teacher and is very clear and precise.  The accompanying booklet is like a daily practice outline.  Really great!!
The best one so far. Most just show you how to play songs. This DVD set was great for fundementals and chords. Well done. I enjoyed several others but I like to be taught concepts, not songs.
Great DVDS going to keep me busy for long time. Mike is a great teacher.

I've admired Mike Marshall's playing for a long time. With only a rudimentary understanding of the mandolin I purchased, this 2 DVD set filled the gap that was missing. The relaxed, honest presentation makes for enjoyable repeated viewings along with inspiration to play. Thanks.
He has a great teaching style and it helps besides practice.

I've been playing mandolin a long time, but I never took lessons and didn't learn the fundamentals (right and left hand technique) to get a good tone. The fundamentals DVD is clear and informative. There's a lot to practice. Haven't gone on to watch the chords DVD yet.
